Chapter 22

Translator: Mosstree


Chapter 22: After Being Forcibly Kissed by a Man


“Manager, Little Jiang didn’t come to the store today?”


“Yeah, Ah Rui asked for leave on the phone. He said he was a bit uncomfortable and would like to rest at home for a few days. Originally, I wanted to take time to see him, but he kept shouting no, so I also have no way to help him.” Song Bohao helplessly smiled, his smile full of a pampering flavor.


“Manager, when did you and Little Jiang meet? It seems like you often go to his house.” Song Bohao always spoiled Jiang Chengrui like his own brother, which made Wei Han a little curious.


“It was from early on. Our parents were good friends when they were young, so we both often come and go,” Song Bohao said, his thoughts drifting away. “I remember that when Uncle Jiang and Aunt Liu were still there, Sister Chenghui wasn’t as cold as she is now, and her mouth always had a smile.”


As soon as the topic became heavy, Wei Han gave a faint “oh” sound. He also didn’t want to talk about the Jiang family’s irreversible sadness.


In a flash, it was Monday. Jiang Chengrui didn’t even come to class, so in the catch and grapple class, Wei Han had no partner for the two-person sparring exercise. He could only press his legs to the side alone, and prepare for sprint training.


Their martial arts teacher surnamed Huang was originally from the armed police, and had always been very optimistic about Jiang Chengrui as a student. Jiang Chengrui also performed very well in class. Not seeing him today, he also felt strange.


“Wei Han, Jiang Chengrui asked for leave?” Teacher Huang asked, coming to Wei Han’s side.


Wei Han nodded. “Yeah, Little Jiang seems to be sick.”


“Strange, that kid usually has a good body, how can he get sick? I think you’re very familiar with him. Later, go and look at him for me.”


Finished speaking, Teacher Huang patted Wei Han heavily on the shoulder. Not knowing whether it was intentional or not, Wei Han grimaced, his smile turning stiff. His amazing strength was not something that the average person could bear.


After class, Wei Han gave Jiang Chengrui a call.


To be honest, Wei Han was also very puzzled. Little Jiang seemed to be from a martial household. Even if he was sick, it wouldn’t be a serious illness, and his body should be able to recover soon. Don’t tell him that something had happened?


“Hey, Little Jiang, this is Wei Han. What’s wrong with you?”


“No…nothing, just a little uncomfortable.”


Unlike the frank and straightforward Jiang Chengrui in the past, the voice on the phone was clearly concealing something. Wei Han heard that something was wrong. “Little Jiang, you can deceive other people, but you can’t deceive me. Is it a problem at home? Or is it your sister, she…”


Jiang Chengrui hurriedly interrupted Wei Han’s guesses. “It has nothing to do with my sister. She has been busy, and the home is also good. It’s my own matter.”


“Then what’s your situation?”


“Silly Han, I was forcibly kissed by a man, and it was my first kiss.”


Wei Han was instantly petrified: “……”


In the afternoon, knowing that Qi Zhifan didn’t have any classes, Pei Yuyang was too lazy to stay in the jewelry company Dad Pei had arranged for him. He drove Qi Zhifan to go out and play, and went to the fencing hall that Pei Yuyang frequented.


On the fourteen meters long and two meters wide fencing strip, Pei Yuyang had lost the previous foil, and now the two were beginning to fence again.


Qi Zhifan’s eyes were like torches and he changed from his former elegant movements. He aimed at the opponent’s valid parts, and his fencing movements were very quick. It was so quick that Pei Yuyang had no time to attack, only blocking one after the other, but his arms were still jabbed a few times.


“Yo, Ah Fan, you have been very angry recently. Your moves are all so ruthless.”


Qi Zhifan didn’t answer, but when his thoughts turned to Wei Han, his chest felt a burst of smothered anger.


That fool, must he hang himself on the tree? Clearly knowing that Chu Chuanyao liked a female teacher, he actually helped him to chase the woman, too ridiculous.


“Let me guess ah, it’s related to Chu Chuanyao?” Even after being hit three times, Pei Yuyang still casually smiled.


Qi Zhifan deeply knitted his brows. A dark tip flashed in his eyes, and he began to ruthlessly hit again.


“Purple Sheep!”


Suddenly, a tender voice was heard outside of the field.


Not knowing when, Little Yi had appeared, really giving Pei Yuyang a small fright. In a moment of inattention, Qi Zhifan suddenly knocked the sword out of his hand.


Seeing Pei Yuyang standing foolishly in place, Qi Zhifan took off his helmet, shot Little Yi a glance, and looked back at Pei Yuyang. “Your son?”


“How could I have such a big son? I live clean and honestly ah!” Pei Yuyang immediately retorted, “And I’m not like you. I only like men.”


“Purple Sheep, you have to take responsibility!” Little Yi shouted again.


The light in Qi Zhifan’s pupils changed. “Take responsibility? It turns out you’re a pedophile.”


“You’re accusing me wrongly ah!” Pei Yuyang shouted, face filled with resentment, “Ah Fan, what kind of person do you really think I am ah.”


“A pervert, nothing more.”


Words finished, Qi Zhifan waved his hand and went straight to Little Yi. Little Yi, who had just left school, was carrying a schoolbag and his mouth was open and huffing.


Afterwards, the three people went to a nearby restaurant.


Pei Yuyang specially asked the waiter to prepare milk for Little Yi. But Little Yi shouted that he wanted Coke, hitting and biting at Pei Yuyang. Pei Yuyang was not afraid of him. His face was smiling as he continued to coax Little Yi.


Qi Zhifan swept across the twittering adult and child across from him, and spat out the words “Coke kills sperm”. Suddenly, the ears were a lot more peaceful.


“Little Yi, you really have ability. How did you find me?” Pei Yuyang reached out and wanted to touch Little Yi’s head.


Little Yi seemed to be mad at him and avoided it. “I went to your house first. Uncle Chen told me, and then he had people brought me over. But when I got out of the car, I let those strange uncles in black go back because I wanted to make a surprise attack!”


The “Uncle Chen” Little Yi mentioned was Pei Yuyang’s personal butler. Because Little Yi hid from Jiang Chengrui and had secretly gone to Pei Yuyang’s mansion several times, the butler also recognized him.


“Heh, you’re really a child prodigy, totally different from your brother.”


“Hmph! Purple Sheep, you rogue, you bullied my honest brother.” Little Yi face changed and pulled on Pei Yuyang’s mouth. “Say it! What shameful thing did you do to my brother four days ago? Honest can be lenient, defiant will be strict ah!”


“Hurt…it hurts!” In an instant, Pei Yuyang couldn’t smile anymore, and quickly caught Little Yi’s mischievous little hand,” Little Yi, be good. Later, I still have to rely on this mouth to kiss Curlie.”


“You dare kiss my brother?!” Little Yi stared with round eyes.


Qi Zhifan was unperturbed, raised his eyebrows and said, “You kissed, then did you sleep with him?”


Once again struck a blow, Little Yi was frightened and stammered, “You still…still dare to sleep…sleep…”


“Absolutely not!” Pei Yuyang repeatedly waved his hand. It seemed as though he got a huge bargain, but his appearance was one of nursing grievances. “Curlie’s lethality is too great. That day, I just kissed him a little bit on the mouth, and the result was that he pushed me into the river. Fortunately, I can swim, or I must’ve drowned.”


“……”


Qi Zhifan suddenly didn’t want to know this person a little.


“Hahaha, you deserved it!” Little Yi laughed and asked, “But later, why didn’t you come find him even once?”


Pei Yuyang softly sighed and shook his head slightly. “Before, I went to the dessert shop to find him once. At that time, Wei Han wasn’t there, and that long-faced Manager Song said that Curlie wasn’t there and quickly drove me out. I thought that Curlie was really angry and didn’t want to see me at all.”


Looking at Pei Yuyang’s helpless and desolate appearance, Little Yi suddenly wasn’t even a little mad at him anymore. “My brother didn’t want to see you, but he also didn’t see anyone else ah. He kept himself in the house for three days.”


Pei Yuyang was vastly surprised. “What! What’s wrong with Curlie? Is he sick?”


Little Yi raised his chin. “Do you really want to know? Then you can come back with me and see. You must take responsibility for my brother!”


His voice hadn’t fallen when Pei Yuyang immediately got up and hurriedly put on his coat. “Ah Fan, I…I have something urgent and have to leave first, you…”


“Go ahead.”


Qi Zhifan waved his hand, lips hooking into a smile, and continued to leisurely drink tea. It seems that there were some things that needed to be solved in a “rough” way. He also wanted to try after going home tonight.


The next day, Jiang Chengrui finally came to class. At first, Wei Han was still worried about him, but Jiang Chengrui’s entire being seemed to be suddenly enlightened, and looked very spirited.


Wei Han felt a little strange and asked, “Little Jiang, Pei Yuyang, he…”


For the first time, Jiang Chengrui didn’t shy away from the name, and straightforwardly said, “He ah, he came to find me last night.”


Wei Han was startled. “And then?”


“Then, I beat him up and got over it.” Jiang Chengrui smiled and was in a good mood.


“……”


Wei Han suddenly felt distressed for that Foolish Man-Sheep, but then thought that since he was a shaking M, he should be very happy.


In the evening, Wei Han had just entered the door and hadn’t taken off his shoes yet, when Qi Zhifan suddenly appeared. His arms stretched out and his hand braced against the wall. He used his powerful aura to force Wei Han against the wall.


Wei Han immediately felt a sense of oppression, and staring stupidly, he looked up. “Odd Trouble, you…what are you doing?”


Qi Zhifan’s gaze was deep, and indifferently said, “Pei Yuyang kissed Jiang Chengrui…”


“Yeah, and?”


“And…”


At this moment, Qi Zhifan’s words had not finished when the mobile phone ring floated out from his pant pocket.


QI Zhifan frowned, chose to ignore it, continued to look into Wei Han’s eyes and said, “And, I also…”


Wei Han’s mobile phone also rang…


Qi Zhifan: “……”


This week, Wei Han and Jiang Chengrui’s criminal investigation class came to C City on a trip that was organized by the school.


According to S Uni’s arrangement in previous years, Wei Han, who was in the second half of the semester, had to go through a period of training for the criminal investigation class. In particular, students who chose criminal police type of courses would have three months of training which was always conducted as closed training in C City.


In order to familiarize themselves with the training environment in advance, Wei Han also chose to come first.


In the training base, there were not only the students from Wei Han’s school, but also other students from the Public Security Police Academy. In order to increase their competitiveness, they and the students in the C Uni’s Public Security Academy were randomly assigned into teams by the various coaches.


Wei Han and Jiang Chengrui, still brought together by fate, were assigned to the same team. However, there were several dislikable guys from C Uni on the same team, especially one named Shao Yi. He was ranked among the best in skills, and was very egotistical and arrogant.


As a matter of fact, when practicing long-range shooting, Shao Yi wanted to compete against Jiang Chengrui and insisted on asking the coach for a match with Jiang Chengrui.


For ordinary students like Wei Han, the best result was 7 points at most, but the level of Jiang Chengrui and Shao Yi were much higher. Basically, if it wasn’t 9 points then it was 10 points. Jiang Chengrui’s highest score was 10.7 points.


Several times, the two were equally matched. Shao Yi smiled coldly and felt that it was boring, and said that he would change to a moving target. Once this kind of shooting began, it was necessary to continuously fire a specific number of rounds and must not be interrupted. This was a test of the shooter’s thinking agility. They must respond quickly, have accurate judgment, but also have good psychological self-control ability.


They chose the 50-meter standard speed course. The pig target ran slowly for thirty seconds, then ran fast for thirty seconds. The shooter had to shoot sixty rounds.


In the end, Jiang Chengrui still beat Shao Yi with 580 points, and turned his thumb down at Shao Yi.


Wei Han also took the opportunity to stick out his tongue. “People should be a bit more humble, don’t you know? Arrogant Shao.”


“What did you call me?” Shao Yi, face calm and collected, unhappily said.


Used to seeing Qi Zhifan’s angry expression, Wei Han’s courage had also been trained. He didn’t retreat and stepped forward. “Arrogant Shao, I am kind enough to advise you to be ‘less arrogant’.”


“……”


After this, Shao Yi, who had only had a weak chicken impression of Wei Han in the beginning, began to take a little interest in Wei Han.


The week soon passed. On the last day in C City, Wei Han went to the local specialty small commodity street, ready to buy some souvenirs to take back, and then see if there was any suitable gift for Chu Chuanyao.


“Wei Han, Brother Wei?”


When passing a boutique, Wei Han was caught off guard when someone called out to him. He looked back and unexpectedly, it was Lu Yan, whom he hadn’t seen for a long time. Lu Yan was standing next to tall, handsome guy.
